title: New & Video: Jonti – Saturday Night
body:
**Jonti**, right smack in the middle of his much publicised tour with **Gotye,** has released a brand new cut,”_Saturday Night_“, a new recording of **Jonti**‘s demo track from _[Sine & Moon](http://www.stonesthrow.com/news/2012/01/jonti-sine-and-moon-album-free-download)_, his album of 4-track demos. And what a marvel it is, composed, remarkably honest and produced to a minute degree of perfection, it’s perhaps the ‘play me out’ lullaby the summer was always waiting for.

Video by Eric Coleman.

**Download MP3** | [Jonti – Saturday Night](http://www.stonesthrow.com/downloads/jonti-saturday.mp3)

**JONTI WITH GOTYE, EUROPE TOUR DATES, NOV. 2012**  
Nov 08: Frankfurt, Germany @ Jahrhunderthalle  
Nov 09: Munich, Germany @ Zenith  
Nov 10: Amsterdam, Holland @ Heineken Music Hall  
Nov 12: London, UK @ Hammersmith Apollo  
Nov 15: Manchester, UK @ Manchester Apollo  
Nov 17: Lisbon, Portugal @ Campo Pequeno  
Nov 19: Berlin, Germany @ Columbiahalle Arena  
Nov 21: Copenhagen, Denmark @ Falconer Hall
